title: Anyone interested in working on a 1909 Obak project?
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Anyone interested in working on a 1909 Obak project?
posts.post_content: Figured it's been awhile since I put together a good "cabal" :)  Let me know if interested.
Could still use 1-2 more guys for a large 1909 Obak project.  Thanks guys...
